transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji boliyega.
Customer: Hello, hi good morning Khushboo, Arpit this side from IndiaMART office. Actually abhi mere aapke owner se baat hui company ke owner se. To aapka IndiaMART pe business store rakha hai. So I need some details like categories vagera add karni thi aapki profile mein. To uss cheez ke regarding aapke owner ne aapko connect karne ke liye bola hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To currently like is this a good time because I need to connect you over a meeting and video meet.
Customer: Sir isme kya kya details hai wo thoda bata dijiye kyuki isme naya hai na. Koi idea nahi hai isme kaise leads vagera aayenge ya fir kya kya karna hoga.
Executive: Services consume matlab services use kaun karta hai? Aap karte hai ya fir owner karte hai?
Customer: Hum hi karte hai.
Executive: Aap hi karte ho? Okay. So like do you know aapko leads vagera kaise consume karni hai, kaise filter out karna hai cheezon ko?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: So basically currently jo products add ho rakhe hai na granular WPP granular, SBP granular ye sare products add ho rakhe hai. So inme basically.
Customer: Dhire boliye ga kya?
Executive: Achha. Sir thoda dhire baat kijiye. Please mujhe samajh mein nahi aayega.
Executive: Aapke currently jo products add ho rakhe hai na WPP granular, SBP. So like inme maximum hum do categories add kar sakte hai. To currently ek category add ho rakhi hai. Category basically aapka like keywords ki tarah act karta hai. Jis naam se like customer search kar raha hai. To wo humko keywords aapki profile mein dalne hote hai. Taki like koi search ho to aapki profile wo match ho and aapke paas wo leads generate kare. To uss din humne yes yes. Ab uss din problem ye hua ki uss din unke jo products add ho rakhe the unhone wo sare hatwaye hai. Like scrap vagera add ho rakha tha and uss din ye wale products add karwaye the unhone.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: To usi cheez usi din maine unko bola tha ki like thoda bahut profile mein changes karne padenge. So like hum next call pe ek bar aap use karke dekho services. Ek mere ko feedback dena to main categories bhi kar dunga. To usi cheez ke regarding mere ko connect karna hai video meet pe.
Customer: To fir uske liye fir kya karni hogi fir?
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Uske liye kya karni hogi?
Executive: Uske liye kuch nahi ek bar aap video meet pe connect kar lo. Main aapki profile mein changes karunga screen share karke to mere ko bata dena ki sahi hai ya nahi hai. And do teen cheeze mere ko additional cheeze bhi batani thi like services ka hi. To main wo bhi bata dunga aapko.
Customer: Abhi bata dijiye aap. Kya kya services plan hai?
Executive: Okay, to main aapko link share kar raha hu. Ek bar join kar dena, thik hai? Ek bar aapke paas abhi aapke IndiaMART mein jo registered email ID hai wo hai na aapke paas?
Customer: Hmm, mere paas abhi available nahi hai.
Executive: Ek bar apna number WhatsApp number bata dena aapko us pe WhatsApp pe share kar deta hu link.
Customer: IndiaMART to hai na aapke paas IndiaMART ka application?
Customer: Mere paas nahi hai. Sir ke paas available tha wo.
Executive: To aap use kaise karte ho fir?
Customer: Like jaise lead vagera aati hai to aapko kaise karna hoga wo bata dijiye to fir main hi use karungi.
Executive: Okay ek bar mere ko apna number bata dijiye main aapko share karta hu.
Customer: Haan jis number pe baat ho rahi hai usi number pe WhatsApp chalti hai hamari.
Executive: Isme show nahi ho raha hai actually. To agar aap bata sakte ho to will be helpful.
Customer: 9 10 20 15 15 5.
Executive: 9 10 20 15 15 5. Ji.
Executive: Mam maine aapko hi ka message kar diya kar ke reply dena.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Maine aapko hi bheja hai. Aapko show kar raha hai kya?
Executive: Nahi maine aapko actually link bhi share kar diya hai. Ye hai na aapka number 9 10 9102015155.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan maine link to share kar diya hai aapko check karo ek bar. Message aaya nahi mere paas aa raha.
Customer: Abhi show kar rahi hai aapko kya?
Executive: No ek bar apna network check karna. Message na mere message actually seen bhi nahi hue hai reply bhi nahi aaya and maine link share kar rakha hai.

Executive: Just a minute main ek bar aapko dobara bhej deta hu.
Executive: Aapne WhatsApp pe hi share kiya hai na?
Executive: Just a minute.

Executive: Haan maine aapke sahi number pe kara hai message to aapka registered bhi wala ho rakha hai. I think network issue hai aapka usme kuch.
Customer: But mere ko WhatsApp pe mere ko lag maine kisi aur pe hi bheja aapka to link share nahi hua hai so.
Executive: Haan mera number hai. Main number bataunga ek bar aapko dobara hi ka message bhej raha hu main. Check karo. Ab aaya hoga.
Customer: Number ke last mein hai 93095.
Customer: 3095?
Executive: Yes. 93095.
Customer: Haan ji ab aa gaya.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Meeting link share kiya hai na aapko? Haan ji haan ji karta hu. Maine meeting ka link share kar diya aapko. Join kar lijiye.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Main iske liye thoda time lagega main ek bar baat karungi fir main aapko bolungi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants details about IndiaMART services.

- How to use leads and filter them.

- Unable to receive the link on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about product categories.

- Executive shared the WhatsApp link again.

- Executive shared meeting link to join.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect after sometime.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, services, whatsapp link, meeting
